an4.89:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvāco hoti, sammākammanto hoti, sammāājīvo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti.
an4.89:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇamacalo hoti.
an4.89:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvāco hoti, sammākammanto hoti, sammāājīvo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti, sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti, no ca kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.89:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko hoti.
an4.89:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … sammāvimutti hoti, aṭṭha ca vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.89:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapadumo hoti.
an4.89:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti?
an4.89:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito … pe … yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti, mameva taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti.
an4.89:8.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
